inclusion.criterion: Confirmed Covid19 patient with positive RT PCR
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current therapy: Recent blood or blood component transfusion in the last 2 weeks.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active malignancy within the last 5 years
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Not willing to participate in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has high blood pressure and signs of septicemia, but is being treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids for atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome.
